org.zkoss.pivot

Interface PivotRendererExt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PivotRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimplePivotRenderer

    public interface PivotRendererExt
extends PivotRenderer
    PivotRendererExt is an extended interface from @link{PivotRenderer}. It provides extra control of look and feel on pivottable.
    Author:
    simonpai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

                        PivotHeaderContext rowContext,
